name: Yoke Chen Fong
content: The financial course was really informative to me. It's kind doing revision for me. And I learned a lot about Excel tools. It's a great course and practicing with quiz and course challenge.

name: S G
content: I took this course to fill in any gaps in my college training and to make sure I can do the financial analyst job. I already knew most of it, thankfully, but managed to pick up a few new tricks. I can say that this course covers material from a couple of accounting courses, finance courses, and an intermediate course of Excel. You have to know the basics of Excel before taking this course to get the most out of it, and there are plenty of Udemy courses that can teach you that.What this course has done for me is give me confidence that I have the skills and knowledge to do the job, and I am pursuing a new position now. The free job hunting guide is helpful in this endeavor.

name: Trang Nguyen
content: I like the short lecture videos with detailed step-by-step instructions with enthusiastic tutor(s). Especially, the materials to practice (Unsolved & solved files) per lecture and the pdf summary of functions/notes are very useful! However, it seems to take a bit long to answer or follow-up with questions. In general, the answers are OK but not thorough and clear enough.

name: Davide PANDINI
content: There is a lot of overlapping with the other course Beginner to Pro in Excel: Financial Modeling and Valuation.I'm not sure the last sections on PowerPoint are really useful.

name: David Monk
content: Really enjoyable. You truly learn valuable and usable information. The course is presented very well. There are plenty of opportunities to put what you've learn in to practice. Includes great resources also. Went above and beyond my expectations. If your looking for a financial analysis course or even a course in excel you will not be disappointed.

name: Bruno Shoiti Natsumeda
content: The course has been excellent. Not only the author levels the necessary Excel knowledge, but there are exercise files to practice them. I learned a lot of ways to build P&L and Balance Sheets that seemed impossible to understand HOW a company builds and updates them. Looking forward to the financial concepts ahead.

name: Trương Đăng Quang
content: Thank to you, I know the basic principles of Business & Accounting. And  this is the Best MS Excel course ever!!! Thank you very much.

name: Alan Tan
content: Couse content is concise and very comprehensive with sufficient practical exercises,I like the flexibility for easy to  access and learn the course at our own pace which is value for money, particularly for busy working class/

name: Marco Concina
content: Fantastic course! Thanks a lot!

name: Wong Khye Yang
content: Really great course jam packed with a lot of useful, practical information.

name: Ferruh Ertekin
content: While the videos are being played, i am trying to catch up by doing the same thing on the excel here but it's not working out, i got to be faster i suppose.

name: Michael Scott
content: The course was informative and engaging. The practical examples and download content provides continuity of application. This course has been helpful in assisting me take a change in my career. The course takes you from basic to complex applications.

name: Carin Camen
content: The resources provided in this course, allows you to follow along with each lesson and do hands on exercise. The instructor pacing, explanation and demonstration was appropriate in order to be allowed to follow along and practice while watching the video. This provided greater efficiency in viewing the tutorial. Questions and feedback on assignments, were promptly answered.

name: Oluwafemi
content: Awesome presentation. This guy is good. Just learn everything he teaches, and you are the best financial analyst in the world

name: Alexander Barberis
content: Step by step instructions are a great help for those who are a bit rusty or learning for the first time. The course gets into highly valuable information quickly and builds on it with each lesson.

name: Paris Alberto Sanchez de la Garza
content: The course explains in detail how to use Excel and Power Point features for financial analysis, also explains the concepts any Financial Accountant must know and gives detail and thorough explanation on them. The course also explains the concepts in the easiest way with several quizzes at the end of the topics to ensure the content is learned. Would definitely recommend.

name: Rahul Singh
content: This Course is a Master Blaster!!!!!!, All the lectures are very well designed and give you the best available use of it. It is packed with Multiple Sheets for practice with solutions. Lectures are short, clear and to the point. It is a must go course for every financial professional.I'have learned so much, while I have only completed around 55% of the course. Thank you so very much 365 Careers

name: Abdou Somlare
content: It was a great experience taking this course, and i enjoyed it very much

name: Márton Skach
content: The course is a lot less focused on financial knowledge than expected, Microsoft Excel is strongly emphasized instead, so if you feel fine with your Excel knowledge, the course doesn't worth it for the financial part.

name: Michael Jessen
content: The videos are direct and to the point.  They are easy to understand.  Also, I love how they examine each item separately; I feel like I absorb more of the formulas (for example) when there is a short video for each rather than one video for all of them.  I still have more than half of the class to go but so far so good.

name: Josh Islas
content: Very quality course; could use more frequent quizzes with more than 1 question in order to constantly check for comprehension. Some ideas are shown and then never revisited after a quiz.

name: Patrick Smith
content: The instructor provides a very straightforward breakdown of accounting terms. As someone who has no accounting background, I feel that this course has given me a quick intro to the concepts that I need to understand to be able to talk intelligently about accounting.

name: Mackenzie Hieu La
content: The course is very informative, well structured, good materials. The practice exercises after each lecture and course challenges are plus point - good way to review what I have learned from that section. Now I have more specific ideas of what a Financial Analyst career would be. Overall this is a great course!

name: Eric Winslow
content: A great overview of the financial analyst position. Includes most of the knowledge and skills that will be needed in the field. Some of the videos are pretty short but get the point across well. I found myself having to look elsewhere online for more depth on some of the topics. This core is a great foundation that you can build off yourself.

name: Bob Walters
content: Starts with some useful Excel tips...then some (dry) accounting definitions...then the payoff with GL, financial statements, and modeling. Sehr gut!

name: Beg_2009
content: Very professional! Short and informative videos. High recommend for people who want to gain knowledge of Excel and Accounting.

name: Guneyakdogan Akdogan
content: Think the videos are great and well explained. Really something I can recommend to anyone who want to upgrade current Excel skills, understand the technical side of financial statement analysis and expand their competences withing modelling in Excel. Thumbs up!

name: Jeena Joubita Narayan
content: Easy to understand and simple and tutor lectures are understandable

name: Athena Liu
content: It was really helpful :)

name: Wole Olorunleke
content: Despite how frequently I use Excel, I have gained a lot of insight and useful techniques here. It is providing me the opportunity to grow in the role I am currently in.

name: Danijela
content: Very clear and concise examples.... Looks good for now, hope to become even better

name: R. Norder
content: Great course!. Clearr voice and very well explained. 5 stars!

name: Brent Wedge
content: This course is extremely straightforward and is helping me completely refresh my memory of excel. Although yall teach the formulas in a more understandable way than my teacher ever did.

name: Abi Moosa
content: This is by far the most comprehensive and engaging course I have taken on Udemy. It has gone into far more depth, provided much more value than I ever thought. I have been working through it slowly and am personally motivated to come back and keep learning because the teaching style of show and then practice works really well for me. I believe these skills will be valuable in both my personal and professional life. I'm so glad I signed up!

name: Senan Alshutbi
content: The course is totally great. it exposes a lot of excel functions and formula that I didn't know before. Also, it is well explained and easy to follow and understand.

name: Merhal Serban
content: The presentation of informations are ilustrated in very suggestive way and it's easy to understand all informations.

name: Alex Giumarra
content: so far so good! just finished all the videos. Lots of good stuff

name: Krzysztof Wojtas
content: Many useful tips, especially for someone not familiar with excel. The title of this course is somewhat misleading. It won't help you to become financial analyst (there is so much that need to learn to become even a decent financial analyst) but it will help you to become more proficient with excel.

name: Sahil Kaushal
content: Course is quite detailed and helpful in refreshing the basic concepts. It also gives significant amount of information on complex functionalities.

name: Nguyen Thao Khanh Van
content: Some are so simple but there're interesting things to learn.

name: Charles Lyndon
content: Great course, easy to follow. Even learnt some new things at the basic excel level I was unaware of. Have only just completed the creating a P&L from scratch section and looking forward to the rest. I have only previously used financial models built by other collegues but am now excited to create my own or at least contribute to improving current models.

name: Aaron Montero
content: I expected a course on financial analysis, but so far it's been just about basic excel functions. e.g. formatting, copy& paste, basic formulas. Nothing useful for anyone with intermediate knowledge of excel.

name: Jazmine Linnette
content: Some of the basic information is thorough, but boring. Once you get to the more difficult stuff though, you understand the importance of the extra details.

name: Federico Vargas
content: It is an excellent course, even though I find it a bit annoying at the beginning since we had to review everything I knew from basic  and intermediate courses, I suddenly discovered the amazing program this is, and all new tricks, and tools that I was not familiar with, or that I had forgotten about them. And the explanation is very easy to follow, clear pronunciation and perfect understanding of the topics. Plus very good real life examples to take the learning curve to the next level.

name: Chong Wei Zhen
content: Amazing course. Covers a wide content, clear structure and easy to follow

name: Cecilia Lewis
content: The functions in excel were easier for me as an accounting manager and functions that I had done the longer way have now become very easier and in a more efficient way.

name: Majed Abu Al-Faraj
content: Basic questions on the quiz. Need more challenges

name: Julia Washburn
content: I feel that I have learned a great deal so far in this course. I appreciate the practical application opportunity I am given in the case study.

name: Ousman Adiss
content: Great explanation and easy to understand

name: Sai Maganti
content: Good course though initially very basic. I understand who this course is for but also could be a refresher

name: Nellaimuthuvel S
content: Best course that I have enrolled by far..

name: Kris Drobot
content: The lessons are well planned out and the content is explained very clearly, making this a good course. There is a lot of useful information in this course, however, much of it was a little bit basic compared to what I had expected and been looking for. With it being a complete financial analyst course, I expected it to go into more depth on many topics. I would suggest this course would be more effective if it were broken up into two separate courses, with the first one covering the basic excel functions and accounting/finance background info, and then a second course that would go more in depth with more complicated financial modelling, etc. That way, those with a finance background do not have to go through all the basic fundamentals. For someone just starting out in finance though, this course explains the concepts in a very easy to understand manner. Overall a solid course though.

name: Cynthia
content: This is a thorough course - the exercises are challenging. I have a background in finance and feel this gives you a great foundation if you are new to the subject.

name: Alessio Fiumano
content: Good introductory course, it should go deeper in certain areas of financial analysis.

name: Luis Enrique
content: at the beginning is to basic, but midway is just what a intermediate excel user needs.

name: Anush Zamani
content: I found the power point section very basic.

name: Ikeno Isaacs
content: I never knew how to do any of these simple functions and this made it so easy to learn.

name: Patkul Shah
content: This is a must have prerequisite for all entry level finance analyst!

name: Dipan Patel
content: Very Organized and upto point. Very informative.

name: Matheus Andrade Saraiva
content: It was worth the price. Good Excel course and it does teach little about finance.

name: Roselyn Tolentino
content: Quality is wonderful and very informative as well as great narrator!

name: Jared Rentz
content: I love the course it moves quickly through things and the concepts are real world useful so far. Thanks for creating this course!

name: JeffMcEvoy
content: fast moving lessons and all the information seems to be in order.  Easy to understand and I have a better grasp on Excel following the individual lessons.

name: John Ross Valderama
content: I had to skip a few of the lectures on Excel since I use excel extensively at work. Eventually I got to a point where I learned something new, Index & Match is definitively something that I'm going to incorporate in my workplace. A few other useful tools that he went over that I wasn't taught in school were sensitivity analysis and goal seek. I am very excited to see what else I'm going to learn from this course, since I'm am now in the P&L portion of the course.

name: Dennis Yu
content: Great comprehensive course!

name: Lanisha McLendon
content: This course has given me a clearer view of what a business expects in finances compared with what you learn at the university and placed in the fire at the job.  I enjoyed the teaching methods with the animated pictures and hand on examples.

name: Cameron Carver
content: As a recently graduated business student who needed to brush up on old material and also learn new material this is the perfect course. The content is easily and accurately explained, the resources let me practice the lessons on my own, and the online format lets met take the course at my own pace. Makes me question why I even spent all the money on tuition when I could have learned it all here.

name: Pablo Fuentes
content: Quite good, but can go a little fast at times and some financial concepts should be explained first and foremost.

name: Tang xuanwei
content: Insightful and easy for beginners.Although information may be basic for those in the field, there are plenty to learn from the Excel parts and a new perspective for the Accounting & Finance parts.

name: E. Ann Willis
content: because the lesson presented were very informative, easy to follow. I also like that fact that there is a quiz after each section.

name: Cayden Merkler
content: Needs more practice examples

name: Rene Heredia
content: learned a ton on Excel

name: Roger Ball
content: Excellent course. The sections are short and too the point.

name: Ethan Altmire
content: The material is clear and concise, and the instructor is excellent. Some topics could use a little more time.

name: Franklyn Frantos
content: This is an excel course, i thought i was going to learn about financial analyst roles etc

name: Almas Sakpayev
content: Great training, clear explanations, useful tips. Thanks!

name: Ishan Pal Singh
content: examples are good but in the start it was kinda redundant. there were lot of things i already knew.

name: Chirantan Gogoi
content: i feel this learning curve will change the way i think and execute problemsthe instructor is very thorough and clear

name: Karen Davies
content: The course is easy to understand with excellent examples, it starts with simple information to ensure everyone is up to speed and then picks up pace, without being confusing or rushed. I highly recommend this course to anyone with an interest in Excel or Finance.

name: Alonso Carballo
content: Great introduction to financial analysis and basic accounting

name: Kara Henderson
content: The explanations could be more clear, and are at times needlessly complicated

name: Victor okon
content: Clear with great exercises to enhance understanding.

name: James Cochrane
content: This is a great course and I am learning quite a bit about financial analysis.

name: Anna Roxane Matsuda
content: Easy to follow with thorough discussion

name: Ning Wang
content: great course, I learn a lot so far, will keep finishing it.

name: Athul Bhargav
content: Good excel refresher course!

name: Michael Brown
content: It is very detailed, but holds your attention because the actual Lectures are not too long! I am really enjoying this course!

name: Musa Abdullah
content: Very detailed and informative with easy to follow examples

name: Vinu Sagar
content: It is Excellent

name: Rob Roszkowski
content: The course is REALLY darn good!  Wish you were around when i was taking accounting course at the university 20 years ago!

name: Tianyu
content: 以前上过excel课程，本来不想上这个课程里excel部分，不过上了之后还是学到了之前很多不会的东西，讲的不错，目前为止体验很好，钱花的很值。

name: Say hi to... Vasu Tyagi
content: pretty damn good guys. keep it up!

name: Jonathan Ojesebholo
content: Well explained course

name: Nikolas Fendi
content: So far so good. The good gives wonderful guidance and practical knowledge.

name: Lorraine Becker
content: This ramps up very quickly in level of difficulty. 15 minutes ago I was learning how to paste cells and now I am being tested on creating a database

name: Vasudevan PC
content: In-depth learning in an interactive and modern approach.

name: Diego da Silva Fernandes
content: Very nice course and easy to understand.

name: Lutfi Al Nahin
content: The video lengths could have been increased with more examples.

name: Jim Hamilton
content: This is a great course but sometimes hard for me to understand.

name: Stacy Mendoza
content: Great!. Simple visuals and short explanations allows user to understand easily, digest, and retain knowledge.

name: Ibrahim Mohammed
content: Excellent. Exactly what I was looking for. Nicely organised with each video coming up practice sheets, that really makes the difference

name: Helen M Somanji
content: I like the way the course is taught. Just from the introduction I am excited about the course. I can't wait to find time to continue studying. Since i will be shuttling between work and studies.

name: Jamal Baghirov
content: Introductory parts are a little bit long. Instead of discussing for hours how great Excel is, It would be better to get directly to the main points.

name: Chirag Patel
content: Great course

name: Santhosh HS
content: Thank you. Great experience.

name: Akash Bhojraj
content: very clear way to explain what to expect and how to excel.

name: Harry Hunt
content: Really good course helps me with my work as a business analyst, already saving hours of time using excel from this course!

name: Gustavo Henrique Carvalho
content: Great course!!! There are lots of exercises so you can practice while you move through the course. You can buy this course blindfolded and you will not regret it.

name: Elena Zubiria
content: Excelente !!! facil de entender y muy práctico

name: Mr. Colin Lancaster
content: Great teaching. Good exercises. Learning a lot!

name: Genise Keith
content: Even though I knew pretty much the basic of Excel, he kept my interest as if I did not know some of it and yet I learned some things

name: Daniel Rivera
content: Very short and easy to understand videos.  Also, very easy to bookmark and know where you previously left off.

name: Jack Liang
content: little bit easy

name: Lachezar Ignatov
content: It is not simple to understand, as the videos are usually is too brief with simple tables, but at the end they finish with huge tables. Well, it is excel and if I want to become a master of it, I should know that needs more time and practicing.

name: Tony Posteraro
content: Love that it is breaking down the program and going through various functionality and formulas.

name: Lynn
content: The instructor is very clear in explaining the lessons!

name: Pramit Chaudhuri
content: Still waiting for the exciting stuff

name: Victor Ferraiuolo
content: already familiar with excel

name: Leslie
content: Very easy to follow and great information! This course has helped me become a wiz at Excel!

name: Julio A Tinajero Pedraza
content: It seems a really helpful and useful course.

name: Mark Jebb
content: Even though I am way past this level already in Excel, I do like how easily you are teaching the basics on Excel so that if a new comer to this program can easily follow it.

name: Essence Hayes
content: I love that every every new lesson there is practice. I am a hands on learner and that helps a lot. Also, it helps that the examples apply to financial statements and modeling.

name: Raven Darling
content: The instructor is a little fast and I would imagine this will definitely be something you'll have to try a couple times to remember it.

name: Gautam Kumar
content: Yes this course is awesome for some one interested in finance and does not know accounting can start from here,,the excel course is far better than some other courses ,,difference is simple ,this course has time saving learning but others consume a lot of time even completing 10% of their course we do not come to the point but this course from starting gives us feeling of knowledge that we learn in very few time,,great.

name: Travis Dillard
content: The conductor provides clear understanding of the program.

name: David Em
content: Moving very slow at this point. Thought you would assume that people had basic excel knowledge who want to be a financial analyst.Update - About halfway through and the course is beginning to pick up. Some very useful excel tips are given as well.

name: Jinwoog Joseph Kim
content: It was easy to follow so far as it was well explained and the teacher/lecturer spoke in a calm and easy to understand tone, speed and pronunciation!

name: Eric Rascon
content: Simple basic lessons

name: Eva Da
content: Great course, I give it 4 stars mainly because I believe that it would have been a better idea to explain what P&L stands for and what it is before you start talking about how to make it in Excel. I got really confused at that part and had no idea whats going during the Excel P&L. Otherwise so far so good.

name: Andreas Kraus
content: Good introductions to the accounting and financial topic in general. Good introduction to MS Office. But not recommend for advanced students as only basic information are given.Guter Kurs um das Thema Buchhaltung, Finanzen und MS Office kennenzulernen. Grundlagenvermittlung auf unterer Ebene.

name: Nicholas Glaze
content: haven't gotten to much information in the first few lectures to give it a high rating

name: Avinav Kartikay
content: Crystal clear content, very intuitive

name: John McIlvaine
content: Very good job explaining the concepts in a slow and easily-understood manner.

name: Hyacinth Hill
content: It is very informative

name: Irene Winstrand
content: It has been a good go through of what this course is all about and what I will learn.

name: Andrew Darby
content: Good, clear explanations so far.

name: Sergey Kazarian
content: Курс очень хороший. Только как запомнить новые знания?

name: Grace Kasonde
content: Great I am learning new things

name: Teodoro Romiti
content: Very straightforward. I would suggest the authors to go into more detail within the topics.

name: Mohamed Abo Bakr Elboghdady Esmail
content: It's Amazing Course I learned a lot of new things
